route: Exit the Main Building, follow the path north past the Sun Yat-sen Place, and continue straight to Knowles Building.
Head south from Knowles Building, pass the Sun Yat-sen Place, and arrive at the Main Building.
From Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing, walk west across the open plaza and turn right to Eliot Hall.
From Eliot Hall, head east across the open plaza until you reach Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing.
Exit Swire Building, head south down the hill, and take a right to reach the Main Library.
From the Main Library, head north uphill and take a left to arrive at Swire Building.
Walk south from KK Leung Building, cross the open quad, and take a left towards Hui Oi Chow Science Building.
Exit Hui Oi Chow Science Building, cross the quad, and head north to arrive at KK Leung Building.
Leave TT Tsui Building, walk east down the steps, and take the path leading to Rayson Huang Theatre.
Exit Rayson Huang Theatre and head west up the steps to reach TT Tsui Building.
From Sun Yat-sen Place, go north and take the path leading to Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall.
Head south from Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall along the main path to reach Sun Yat-sen Place.
Head west from Runme Shaw Building, cross the courtyard, and enter Run Run Shaw Building.
From Run Run Shaw Building, walk east across the courtyard to arrive at Runme Shaw Building.
From James Hsioung Lee Science Building, walk south to reach Kadorie Biological Science Building.
Head north from Kadorie Biological Science Building to reach James Hsioung Lee Science Building.
From Meng Wah Complex, walk west to reach Hui Oi Chow Science Building.
Exit Hui Oi Chow Science Building, head east to arrive at Meng Wah Complex.
From Kadorie Biological Science Building, head south through the campus to reach Chong Yuet Ming Amenities Centre.
Head north from Chong Yuet Ming Amenities Centre to arrive at Kadorie Biological Science Building.
Exit Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing, walk west across the quad, and reach Run Run Shaw Building.
Leave Run Run Shaw Building, head east across the quad, and reach Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing.
From KK Leung Building, head north through the garden to arrive at Swire Building.
Walk south from Swire Building, through the garden, to reach KK Leung Building.
Exit Main Building, walk west along the path, and arrive at Eliot Hall.
From Eliot Hall, follow the path east to arrive at the Main Building.
From Knowles Building, walk south across the lawn to arrive at the Main Library.
Exit Main Library, cross the lawn to the north, and arrive at Knowles Building.
From Chong Yuet Ming Physics Building, walk east to TT Tsui Building.
Leave TT Tsui Building and head west to Chong Yuet Ming Physics Building.
From Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall, walk south to reach Runme Shaw Building.
Exit Runme Shaw Building and walk north to arrive at Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall.
Walk north from Chong Yuet Ming Chemistry Building to reach James Hsioung Lee Science Building.
Head south from James Hsioung Lee Science Building to reach Chong Yuet Ming Chemistry Building.
Exit the Main Library and head west through the courtyard to arrive at Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall.
Leave Hui Pun Hing Lecture Hall, head east across the courtyard to reach the Main Library.
From Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing, walk west to reach Swire Building.
Head east from Swire Building to reach Tam Wing Fan Innovation Wing.
Head south from Kadorie Biological Science Building and enter Run Run Shaw Building.
From Run Run Shaw Building, walk north to reach Kadorie Biological Science Building.
Leave Hui Oi Chow Science Building, head west to arrive at Rayson Huang Theatre.
Walk east from Rayson Huang Theatre to reach Hui Oi Chow Science Building.
